name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: FGK DLC Pack 3
summary:
This DLC includes 5 outfits for Noby and Friends, 8 types of furniture and 1 mini-story.

To use the bonus outfits: Use the Instant Wardrobe Cam located in the basement of your house. The Cam becomes available if you have an Outfit Pic after completing the early-game tutorial.
Bonus furniture is obtainable/craftable at Belle & Oli's Workshop after expanding your house.
